channel.title: Beaglebone Black on Life Reboot
channel.description: Recent content in Beaglebone Black on Life Reboot

item.title: MediaWiki on the Beaglebone Black
item.description: There’s been a lot of excitement over the past 2 years regarding the Raspberry Pi. The Pi is a wonderful piece of hardware / software with a great community behind it. I’m definitely a fan and would happily recommend one to a friend, but there’s another player that is possibly even more exciting for the hardcore nerds - the BeagleBone Black (BB).
